go_data.justification: alphadbeta2 can function as a ligand for vascular cell adhesion molecule 1 (VCAM-1).
The interaction of alphadbeta2 with VCAM-1 is a mechanism by which selective recruitment of eosinophils into sites of allergic inflammation occurs.
beta2 is part of the alphadbeta2 integrin complex.
The beta2 family of integrins, including alphadbeta2, are expressed on the surface of most leukocytes.
